|brand = ASUS |model = Tinker Board |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = <!-- SubModel number, Leave blank for unknown --> |revision = <!-- Model Revision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = N150 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = single-board computer |sernum = 90MB0QY1-M0EAY0 |fcc_id = TX2-RTL8723BS |icid = 6317A-RTL8723BS |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Rockchip;RK3288; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A17 |cpu1spd = 1.8 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = MicroSD Card |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 8 GiB |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = LPDDR3 |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 2 GiB |ram1chip = Samsung;K4E8E324EB-EGCF; |ram1_num = 2 |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8211E; |lan_ports = 1 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = 2C:4D:54 |oui = F0:03:8C
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;;;
|exp_if_types = USB 2.0, MicroSD Card slot |exp_usb_num = 4 |exp_sdmmc_num = 1 |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 5 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = USB Female Micro-B |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Bluetooth 4.0, HDMI 2.0, GPIO |addchip = USB Audio Codec;Realtek;ALC4040;;1; ,,, 4-port USB Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL852G;;1; ,,, Power Management IC w/RTC;Rockchip;RK808-B;;1; |802dot11_protocols = bgn
|defaulip = acquired via DHCP |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |manuf = <!-- Manufacturer --> |manuf_model = <!-- Manufacturer Model --> |manuf_rev = <!-- Manufacturer Revision --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = Armbian
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 02/2017 |estprice = 60 |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B06VSBVQWS |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = Taiwan
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1mod = Realtek RTL8723BS Combo Module (SDIO) |rad1modif = SDIO |rad1chip1 = Realtek;RTL8723BS; |rad1_ant_conn = MHF4 |rad1txchains = 1 |rad1rxchains = 1 |rad1sstreams = 1 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n |rad1n = 150 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *CPU: ''[[Rockchip]]'' RK3288 @1.8 GHz Quad Core SoC :RAM: 2GB Dual Channel DDR3 (LPDDR3) :GPU: Mali-T764 @600MHz
==Requirement== *Micro SD card with at least 8GB capacity *Micro USB cable and a 5V/2A USB power adapter with LPS marking *Monitor with HDMI cable, Keyboard and Mouse set
==Links of Interest== *https://www.asus.com/us/Single-Board-Computer/Tinker-Board/HelpDesk_Download/
